component.name: Groestlcoin Core
component.summary: Connect to the Groestlcoin P2P network

description.p: Groestlcoin is an experimental digital currency that enables instant payments to anyone, anywhere in the world. Groestlcoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. Groestlcoin Core is the name of open source software which enables the use of this currency.
